overview:
Shripriya Mahesh currently advises startups while pursuing her interest in film.

Shripriya was at eBay for several years and her most recent roles included VP of Corporate Strategy and VP of Product Marketing where she oversaw a $400M business. Prior to that she headed Product Strategy and Product Management at the company.

Prior to eBay, Shripriya was the VP of ECommerce at NextCard, the then premier online credit card company.

She has an MBA from Harvard Business School and a BA in Economics from Stella Maris College, Madras University, India.
